title: Piracy - actual and attempted attacks worldwide by country 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of incidents for 7 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of incidents 35.0 is found at Country Nigeria and the minimum is found at Venezuela where Country is 6.0.
The highest Country Nigeria has 29.0 more Number of incidents than the lowest Country Venezuela.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of incidents for 7 number of Countrys.
Country Nigeria has the highest Number of incidents and Venezuela has the lowest Number of incidents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of incidents for 7 number of Countrys.

max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of incidents in each Country on the y axis.
Country Nigeria has the highest Number of incidents and Venezuela has the lowest Number of incidents.
Country Indonesia has the second highest value for Number of incidents.
The difference of Number of incidents between the highest and lowest Country is 29.0.
The Country Nigeria has the highest Number of incidents, followed by Indonesia, and Singapore Staits. Down to the Country Venezuela which is the lowest.
Country Venezuela, and Cameroon share the same value 6.0.
Considered together, the average Number of incidents in all 7 Countrys is roughly 15.0.
